Title: Atlas of Clinical Skills
Author: এম. আফজাল মির
Summary:
Summary of Atlas Of Clinical Skills
B. Saunders. Univ. Hospital of Wales, Cardiff. Atlas for undergraduates. Presents step-by-step illustrations of clinical examination. Color photographs and line-drawn illustrations. Softcover.

Title: Liver and Biliary Disease
Author: মিলওয়ার্ড-স্যাডলার
Summary:
Liver and Biliary Disease: Practical Gastroenterology and Hepatology
This comprehensive resource for fellows/trainees and candidates for recertification in gastroenterology summarizes the field in a modern, fresh format. Prominent experts from around the globe write on their areas of expertise, and each chapter follows a uniform structure. The focus is on key knowledge, with the most important clinical facts highlighted in boxes. Color illustrations reinforce the text. 

About the Author

Editor-in-Chief: 
Nicholas J. Talley, MD, PhD, Chair, Department of Internal Medicine, Mayo Clinic College of Medicine, Jacksonville, Florida, USA
Associate editors: 
Keith D. Lindor, MD, Professor of Medicine, Division of Gastroenterology and Hepatology, Mayo Clinic College of Medicine, Rochester, MN, USA 
Hugo E. Vargas, MD, Chair, Division of Hepatology, Professor of Medicine, Consultant, Divisions of Hepatology and Gastroenterology, Mayo Clinic College of Medicine, Scottsdale, AZ, USA
